column4: if there's a new human theme it'll be called human, you're probably using it
uhh, i tried the human theme but it looked the same (and i've never been a great fan of it...)
then stop worrying about new themes or go and find some you do like from gnomw-look
i already have, and i already use a new theme, i was just looking forward for a new theme that came with intrepid...
